sentences.en: A familiar sight on hot summer nights, each firefly flashes its light in a pattern unique to its subspecies.
sentences.cn: 在炎热夏天的夜晚有一个熟悉的景象，每个萤火虫亚种以各自特有的模式闪烁自己的“尾灯”。

sentences.en: A firefly is a type of beetle.
A group of Firefly Girls were here last month.
sentences.cn: 上个月,一队萤火虫女童军来过这里.

sentences.en: Gyokuro residual firefly habitat, early goose whisk Gold River.
sentences.cn: 残萤栖玉露, 早雁拂金河.

sentences.en: How could I make the pigeon seek that firefly out?
sentences.cn: 我该如何让那只鸽子帮我找到萤火虫 呢 ?

sentences.en: I will be as the firefly and my light will brighten the world.
sentences.cn: 舞动翅膀,靠花朵的施舍生活;我要做萤火虫,照亮大地.

sentences.en: Mew : Ahaha ! Not too shabby, little firefly!
sentences.cn: 啊 哈哈! 小萤火虫,不要太寒酸了.

sentences.en: On the way, we stumbled upon a firefly dancing leisurely in the mountains.
sentences.cn: 途中, 我们碰巧发现一只萤火虫悠闲地在山间飞舞.

sentences.en: Shall the nightingale offend the stillness of the night, or the firefly the stars?
sentences.cn: 夜驾会冒犯静夜, 萤火虫会冒犯星空么?

sentences.en: Stronghold: Crusader Extreme is an version of 2001's Stronghold expansion, Stronghold: Crusader by Firefly Studios.
sentences.cn: 要塞: 十字军增强版是一款萤火虫工作室开发的2001年的要塞的资料片的最新版本.

sentences.en: The firefly wakens: waken thou with me.
sentences.cn: 醒着的只有萤火,还有你和我.

sentences.en: The light comes from female firefly squid, which spawn in spring, then die and wash ashore, their tentacles lit like millions of aquamarine LEDs.
sentences.cn: 这种光来自雌性萤火虫鱿鱼，它们在春天产卵，死后，被冲上海岸。 它们的触须像数百万碧绿色LED灯似地闪亮。

sentences.en: Times got the Firefly Girl in the Style section.
sentences.cn: 《时代》把有关萤火女孩的事放在了时尚专栏.

sentences.en: We can capture a butterfly, at night can capture a firefly!
sentences.cn: 我们可以捉蝴蝶, 在晚上还可以捉萤火虫呢!

trans.tran_en: an insect with a tail that shines in the dark
